class.name: MusicXMLParser
class.brief_description: A utility class for parsing raw MusicXML text into usable game data.
class.description: The MusicXMLParser is responsible for interpreting uncompressed MusicXML files. It scans the XML structure to extract critical synchronization data—including tempo changes, time signatures, measure durations, and text cues—and packages them into a [SongData] resource.

method.name: parse_text
method.description: Parses a string containing MusicXML content. This method runs a linear scan of the XML tags to calculate precise timestamps for every measure and extract "Cue" or "Rehearsal" markers. Returns a new [SongData] resource containing the mapped data.
